Articles.Content: Hello im new here but i just need some help with something. How do i set an avatar i cant find the option to upload one, and i dont know what resolution the avatar has to be. Thanks!
More posts are needed, then you can edit you profile and add an avatar.

Hello Mike_Kerm. The forum software is very suspicious, and still thinks you might turn out to be some sneaky spambot! But after you post a few more times, it believes that you're human and grants you the permission to customize your profile.

Welcome to the forum. (Unless you really are a spambot! )
Hi! You need to post more, and then you can have your own avatar.
Ok thanks and no im not a spam bot.
What about the size of the avatar is it like 50x50p or what because this is my first time being on a forum...
You can resize the picture by using Paint.
